Samuel L. Jackson a Anthony Mackie nemôžu kvôli svojej farbe pleti podnikať. Najmú si teda belocha, aby bol tvárou ich firmy
05 Nov 2019, 14:57 by Dominik Vetrák

Film The Banker sa na Apple TV+ objaví v januári 2020.

Snímka vychádza zo skutočného príbehu dvoch afroamerických podnikateľov, ktorí sa počas 50. rokov minulého storočia pokúšali obísť rasové obmedzenia a najali bieleho muža ako tvár ich firmy. Réžie a scenára sa ujal George Nolfi (The Adjustment Bureau). Film  vyzerá celkom inteligentne a zábavne, takže sa z neho môže vykľuť pohodová zábava na jeden večer. 
Joe Morris (Samuel L.Jackson) a Bernard Garrett (Anthony Mackie) sú revoluční biznismeni, ktorí v minulom storočí podnikli riskantný plán na to, aby zbohatli a zároveň pomohli afro-americkej komunite. Akokoľvek schopní a inteligentní boli, ako černosi nemali v 50. rokoch veľké postavenie a nemali šancu zrealizovať svoj plán a využiť svoj potenciál v plnom rozsahu.
Najali si tak belocha z pracujúcej triedy menom Matt Steiner (Nicolas Hoult), ktorého naučili všetko potrebné, aby mohol vystupovať ako tvár ich firmy. Černochom by banky patriace bielym podnikateľom pôžičky pre Afro-američanov nikdy neschválili. 
The Banker bol pôvodne natočený pod Romulus Entertainment, pričom ho Apple kúpilo v lete tohto roka. Nejde teda o originálny film Apple TV Plus ako taký. 6. decembra dostane limitovanú kino premiéru a následne sa v januári dostane aj na streamovaciu službu.

text:
Samuel L. Jackson and Anthony Mackie cannot do business because of their skin color. So they hire a white man to be the face of their business
05 Nov 2019, 15:57 by Dominik Vetrák

The Banker will be featured on Apple TV + in January 2020.

The film is based on the true story of two African-American entrepreneurs who tried to circumvent racial constraints and hired a white man as the face of their business during the 1950s. Directed by George Nolfi (The Adjustment Bureau). The film looks quite intelligent and entertaining, so it can spell out a relaxed one-night entertainment.
Joe Morris (Samuel L.Jackson) and Bernard Garrett (Anthony Mackie) are revolutionary businessmen who have made a risky plan to get rich while helping the African American community in the last century. However capable and intelligent they were, as blacks did not have a great position in the 1950s and had no chance to realize their plan and exploit their full potential.
They hired a working class white guy named Matt Steiner (Nicolas Hoult), who had learned everything necessary to act as the face of their business. Black people would never approve of banks owned by white entrepreneurs for Afro-Americans.
The Banker was originally filmed under Romulus Entertainment and was purchased by Apple this summer. It is not an original Apple TV Plus movie as such. On December 6th the limited cinema will be premiered and in January it will also be available for streaming service.
